Name: Bartender Hustle
About the game: MASTER YOUR CRAFT Mix amazing cocktails at five unique bars with access to over one hundred ingredients including liquors, juices, and garnishes. HAVE A CHAT Meet a variety of customers on your journey as a bartender, each with a unique personality and preference of cocktails. HAVE SOME FUN Test your skill by serving as many customers as possible in the fast-paced Arcade mode, or mix drinks at your own pace in the Sandbox mode.
